name: citizenM Taipei North Gate
detail: I have to say I am in love with the big windows it has in all the rooms. As you may notice, a lot of the Taipei hotels do not have windows in their room yet this one you can enjoy a great view of the busy Taipei. Besides, they have an iPad that allows you to control everything in the room with an app. Though you don't see the usual smart/butt-washing toilet but you get the smart lighting in your shower area in return. All in all, it's a nicely designed hotel which is also a good value for money. An obvious choice in the Taipei Station area.

name: Poshpacker Hotel
detail: I stayed at women's floor. Among lots of hotel in Taipei, the most important thing to me is the cleaness and easy access to station. This hotel is not only good location but also it was very clean and tidy. The room & bed was compact, but to me, there was no problem. I could stay so pleasantly. The first floor is coffee shop; wake up, go down stair, get a cup of offee easily, it is very nice. Around the hotel, there are food shops, book store and department store. You have got lots options to go&eat.
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map

name: Tomorrow Hotel
detail: It's a wonderful hotel in Taiwan. Price, place location and room are excellent at Taipei. Hotel is located at Xiamen, which is a hot shopping area and hotel room is in the lower price around Taipei. We walk 1 minutes from mrt station to hotel. All item of living assessories are provided by the hotel even at small room and lower price.

name: Fun Inn Taipei
detail: It is highly recommendable especially for first timers in trying dormitories. The place is really modern and cozy. The place is well maintained and very clean. The staff are very friendly and can speak English. The area is near the MRT and Ximen which is a place for good shopping and just entertainment during day but mostly at night. Most of all, very budget friendly! The free wifi is sure plus for people to stay connected online. It was my first time traveling doing backpacker style and I will say I will do it again especially in Taiwan and in FunInn Taipei! Really was great experience for me. I'll be back soon and will see you again, FunInn Taipei!

name: Taipei Inn
detail: Itâ€™s a few steps from TMS and meet-up place for tours.
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map

name: miniinn
detail: The location is few steps from one of the exit of Taipei main station. Slipper is provided and towel is available too if you need it. But one thing is I got a upper bed which is quite high and due to I got hand pain problem, it's kinda difficult for me to climb up for 2 nights. The toilet is a bit small to hang our clothes. But overall, it's a good place to stay.
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map

name: NYS LOFT HOTEL
detail: We went in group of 4 (3 friends and an elder mother) in a 7-day trip to Taiwan, with first three days staying at NYS LOFT HOTEL in Taipei. I would say that this staying goes beyonds our expectation for a three-star hotel. (1) Nice and helpful staff with fluent English. They even helped us exchange money at late night when we run out of cash and needed to go early on the following morning to Chiayi. They also allowed us to leave our big luggage at the checkin counter during 2 days we were on our trip to Chiayi. (2) Utilities: Free umbrellas to use whenever you need. Free coffee, tea (on self-serving). Spacious common room for kitchen and living room, with oven, glasses, dishes, and bows (wash yourselves after use). (3) Room services: quite spacious (in the description it writes 9 square meters for double room, but I think it is bigger. All facilities are modern and work well (hot water, air conditioner, mini fridge, mini bar, hair-dresser, etc.) and convenient to use; quiet and clean. We booked 2 rooms for 4 people, and both the rooms are excellent. (4) Location: excellent since it takes only 3 minutes walking to the City Main station. The neighbourhood is packed with lots of local shops, foodstores, convenient stores (7-11 stores, family marts, Life OK,etc. which open 24/7). I definitely book this hotel again for my next trips to Taipei as well as recommend it to my friends :)
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map

name: Mayer Inn
detail: If you want a place to stay in taipei, mayer inn is one of the best. PROS - the taipei main station is just right outside the hotel. the room is a bit small but perfect, if you're looking for a place to rest after getting tired from roaming around the city for the whole day. - got a cheaper rate through agoda - loads of restaurants/shops/mall are close to the hotel - room is clean and staff are prompt in cleaning and refilling the toiletries and complimentary bottled waters/coffee CONS: - staff have difficulty in conversing in english - had difficulty in finding the hotel (its within a building with a different name) - our room is in the 4th floor, but needed to go to 5th floor and use the elevator there to access 4th floor - no windows all in all, the price for the stay is worth it.
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map

name: Hey Bear Capsule Hotel
detail: I've stayed at 2 hotels in Taipei before this and I must say that this one is the cleanest. The only issue is that it's small and you don't have your own bathroom. Duh, it's a capsule. But the capsule itself is clean. Everything you need is in there. You have a locker and you can fit in bags inside the capsule and still have enough leg room. AC is nice and cold. The bed is very comfortable. There's only one pillow, though, but I guess you can have it arranged if you want more pillows (at a fee?). The staff is very good in English and they are absolutely helpful. The toilet and shower are plenty and very clean. You don't have to wait to when you have to go. There's more than enough for the guests. The guests are polite. They respect your privacy and space. It's a very quiet area. I will definitely stay here again. It's a very safe space. As for location- the best! It's near the MRT (walking distance, 3-5 mins) and located at the center. Many uber in the area too.

name: Angels Hostel Taipei Ximen
detail: I never expected a little bit of luxury experience with Angels Hostel Taipei Ximen! I was super happy I booked and stayed with them. Though it was a shared bedroom with other travelers, I felt my belongings are very secured with their individual card type access! I will definitely recommend this place to my friends if they are looking for the best and affordable accommodation in Taipei, Taiwan!
area: Taipei Main Station,Taipei - View on map
